title: The copy of a letter, lately written in meeter, by a yonge gentilwoman: to her vnconstant louer With an admonitio[n] to al yong gentilwomen, and to all other mayds in general to beware of mennes flattery. By Is. VV. Newly ioyned to a loueletter sent by a bacheler, (a most faithfull louer) to an vnconstant and faithles mayden.
author: Whitney, Isabella.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Richarde Jhones dwelling in the vpper end of fleetlane: at the signe of the spied Egle,
